title: 服务器正常启动,控制台找不到日志。
author: 刘秋阳
txt_content:
本帖最后由 刘秋阳 于 2019-7-10 10:30 编辑 

 2019-07-10 10:05:09,358 错误 Error processing element Queue: CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2019-07-10 10:05:09,389 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-07-10 10:05:09,389 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-07-10 10:05:09,420 错误 Unable to locate appender TerminalConsole for logger com.mojang
2019-07-10 10:05:09,420 错误 Unable to locate appender TerminalConsole for logger 
2019-07-10 10:05:09,420 错误 Unable to locate appender TerminalConsole for logger net.minecraft
2019-07-10 10:05:09,561 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-07-10 10:05:09,577 错误 Error processing element Queue: CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2019-07-10 10:05:09,577 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-07-10 10:05:09,592 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-07-10 10:05:09,592 错误 Unable to locate appender TerminalConsole for logger com.mojang
2019-07-10 10:05:09,592 错误 Unable to locate appender TerminalConsole for logger 
2019-07-10 10:05:09,592 错误 Unable to locate appender TerminalConsole for logger net.minecraft


控制台只显示上面的几行字，但是经测试服务器正常启动了,但是控制台没有任何反应，只有这几行字。
自从给服务端使用这个启动器启动后,服务端能正常启动,却找不到日志。启动器地址:
冥想了一夜的服务器启动参数
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-839828-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
请问你的服务器版本以及核心？
目测是classpath崩了
你应该在系统变量中设置了classpath

replies.author: 刘秋阳
replies.txt_content:

请问你的服务器版本以及核心？
目测是classpath崩了
你应该在系统变量中设置了classpath ...
